description:
You guys got to know a little more about Austin in his duo scene with Kaden that we posted in our Sunday update, but tonight I wanted to introduce you to him in his solo video where we first got acquainted. Austin is one fine hunk of a Marine and I'm sure you're gonna be seeing much more of him here at Active Duty. So, tonight let's learn more about him before we get too far ahead of ourselves.

Things started off like always with an initial solo jack off video and Austin was primed and ready to go. We start talking about the biggest load he's ever shot right after he finished bootcamp. He hadn't jerked off the entire time so he was more than ready. He says that load probably could've filled up a lube bottle. He says he jacks off at least once a day. He's been in the Marines for about a year and a half. I had asked Austin earlier if he'd ever done anything with another guy and he said he'd only got a blowjob. He then tells us a little about what he'd be interested in doing with another guy.

In his War Chest solo, Austin gives us lots and lots of nice ass play and shows us what he's got to offer. I think you'll agree (after seeing this and his video with Kaden) that he's got everything it takes and more. The way he shows off that perfect ass is amazing. If you're not drooling by the time he's done, don't worry, I've drooled enough for us both.
title: Austin
